verbs.description: [ARG0: Polls] [V: have] [ARG1: a bad reputation] [ARGM-TMP: these days] , but as Nate Silver ’s pollster ratings at FiveThirtyEight show , quality varies , and as a whole polls are more accurate than we – or Donald Trump – sometimes recognize .

Polls have a bad reputation these days , but [ARGM-ADV: as Nate Silver ’s pollster ratings at FiveThirtyEight show] , [ARG1: quality] [V: varies] , and as a whole polls are more accurate than we – or Donald Trump – sometimes recognize .

Polls have a bad reputation these days , but as Nate Silver ’s pollster ratings at FiveThirtyEight show , quality varies , and [ARGM-ADV: as a whole] [ARG1: polls] [V: are] [ARG2: more accurate than we – or Donald Trump – sometimes recognize] .

Polls have a bad reputation these days , but as Nate Silver ’s pollster ratings at FiveThirtyEight show , quality varies , and as a whole polls are more accurate than [ARG0: we – or Donald Trump –] [ARGM-TMP: sometimes] [V: recognize] .
